content: bring a handmade charm to your holiday decor with the **wintergreen christmas stocking crochet pattern** ✨ this oversized christmas stocking features beautiful texture works up quickly with bulky yarn and is designed as one easy piece - perfect for intermediate crocheters the large stocking design is roomy enough for plenty of holiday gifts and looks stunning in wintergreen or any festive color whether you re creating handmade christmas decorations for your own home or crafting thoughtful holiday gifts this crochet christmas stocking pattern will become a cherished holiday tradition year after year perfect for mantles fireplaces and adding that personal touch to your christmas decor **pattern attributes ** - pattern is simple detailed complete and thoroughly tested - written in standard american terms - skill level intermediate - made with bulky-weight yarn you can double a #4 medium-weight yarn - crochet hook 9mm - size width = 8 height = 19 - step-by-step detailed written instructions - high-quality full photo tutorial included
